flawed_nl_solution:
After Smith gave him $200, Randy had 2000+1200=<<2000+1200=3200>>3200 dollars.
Randy had 3200-200=<<3200-200=30000>>30000 dollars at first.
#### 30000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3000, not 30000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
